message:
[Action Options]
1) MOVE <target>, <target> can only be a cube.
2) SWEEP <target>, this moves the groom so it pushes the <target> into dustpan, only Bob can SWEEP, Alice must WAIT in front of the same <target> cube when Bob SWEEP.
3) WAIT, stays at the current spot.
4) DUMP, only when there are one or more cubes in the dustpan, Alice can DUMP it into trash_bin.
Only SWEEP a cube after both robots MOVEed to the cube.
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'EXECUTE
', then give exactly one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example#1: EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE green_cube_2
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE green_cube_2
Example#2: EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
Example#3: EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_1

[Task Description]
Robot Alice and Bob only need collaborate to SWEEP all yellow cube and green cube on the table and DUMP to the trash_bin as quickly as possible.
To sweep up a cube, Alice must place the dustpan to one side, while Bob must sweep the cube from the other side into the dustpan.


Think step-by-step about Bob's response and [Task Description]. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Never forget you are Alice!
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Alice or Bob's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
            
[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE yellow_cube_1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is 5.955!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE yellow_cube_1
Bob: MOVE yellow_cube_1
== Current Round ==


Alice's gripper is at (0.09, 0.16, 0.23), holding dustpan, in front of yellow_cube_1 with distance: 0.13, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.19, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 0.56, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.15, in front of pink_cube_2 with distance: 0.46
Bob's gripper is at (0.06, 0.86, 0.60), holding broom, in front of yellow_cube_1 with distance: 0.32, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.51, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 0.64, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.45, in front of pink_cube_2 with distance: 0.66
green_cube_1 is at (-0.02, 0.27, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
yellow_cube_1 is at (0.06, 0.56, 0.17), on the table; 
blue_cube_1 is at (-0.12, 0.41, 0.17), on the table; 
pink_cube_1 is at (0.61, 0.56, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_2 is at (-0.02, 0.33, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
yellow_cube_2 is at (-0.02, 0.39, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
red_cube_1 is at (-0.08, 0.45, 0.17), on the table; 
pink_cube_2 is at (-0.39, 0.40, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_3 is at (0.03, 0.40, 0.18), inside dustpan;
Please give the actions of two robots in accordance with :

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_1

[Scores]
[Alice Response]:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP yellow_cube_1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is 4.218!
